original_title: Η Γυναίκα Που Έβλεπε Τα Όνειρα
overview: Something changes in the relationship of Achilleas and Anna when she starts to dream vividly and insists on relating her dreams to her husband. He is a barrister in the middle of an important murder trial and his temper becomes frayed with Anna's seeming indifference and involvement and preoccupation with her dream world.
title: The Woman Who Dreamed
